channel.title: word2vec on My Favorite
channel.description: Recent content in word2vec on My Favorite

item.title: An Introduction of Word2Vec and implementation using Tensorflow
item.description: Word2Vec is not a singular algorithm, rather, it is a family of model architectures and optimizations that can be used to learn word embeddings from large datasets. Embeddings learned through Word2Vec have proven to be successful on a variety of downstream natural language processing tasks.

item.title: [Kaggle Summary] Quora Insincere Questions Classification
item.description: The summary of the notebook about Quora insincere questions classification in Kaggle. The main idea of the notebook is how to solve an imbalanced text classification problem with LSTM networks and Word2vec.
